meanings.definition: A type of leather made from the skin of a sheep or goat.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman used cabretta to make a soft wallet.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pair of gloves made of cabretta for her husband.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a cabretta dress for the sheep fashion show.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as smooth as cabretta, calming the situation.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cabretta filled the room, reminding her of the countryside.

meanings.definition: A type of golf glove made from cabretta leather.
meanings.sent1: He wore cabretta gloves to improve his grip on the golf club.
meanings.sent2: The golf pro recommended cabretta gloves for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The golfer joked that his cabretta gloves had magical powers on the course.
meanings.sent4: Her swing felt effortless, like wearing cabretta gloves for the first time.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the club hitting the ball echoed through the cabretta gloves.
